body_html:
You should try tmux or screen.
I find it better than nohup.
Tmux is a terminal multiplexer. If you close your current terminal, the processus will keep running. You can access back with tmux a.
It is easier to kill a processus than nohup. You can kill it using CTRL+C.
Sometimes it happens that one processus keep running on a GPU. I simply kill it with kill -9 pid. It works perfectly well on my computer.

You should try tmux or screen.
I find it better than nohup.
Tmux is a terminal multiplexer. If you close your current terminal, the processus will keep running. You can access back with tmux a.
It is easier to kill a processus than nohup. You can kill it using CTRL+C.
Sometimes it happens that one processus keep running on a GPU. I simply kill it with kill -9 pid. It works perfectly well on my computer.
body:
You should try tmux or screen.
I find it better than nohup.
Tmux is a terminal multiplexer. If you close your current terminal, the processus will keep running. You can access back with `tmux a`.
It is easier to kill a processus than nohup. You can kill it using CTRL+C.
Sometimes it happens that one processus keep running on a GPU. I simply kill it with `kill -9 pid`. It works perfectly well on my computer.
